code: import axios from'axios';var baseUrl='http://localhost:3001/notes';var getAll=function getAll(){var nonExisting={id:10000,content:'This note is not saved to server',important:true};return axios.get(baseUrl).then(function(response){return response.data.concat(nonExisting);});};var create=function create(newObject){return axios.post(baseUrl,newObject).then(function(response){return response.data;});};var update=function update(id,newObject){return axios.put("".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(id),newObject).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export default{getAll:getAll,create:create,update:update};
